DrNo

"December 11"
 
 You say thanks for remembering
 It's really more like I can't forget
 This love I feel is never-ending
 Sometimes I wonder why we met.
 
 But then I think of your touch and smile
 And I know why you invaded my head
 Even though I haven't seen you in a while
 I know I will love you until I am dead.
 
 And every year when your birthday comes around
 I sit there and wonder...
 I sit without making a sound
 And I imagine you wonder...
 
 You tell me you would like to keep in touch
 But you don't want to cause me anguish
 The thought of seeing you is like a rush
 "Anguish" really is inadequate language
 
 I discovered you were wed and uttered a curse
 I can't imagine things getting much worse
 I guess it really was "too little, too late"
 And now I've lost my soulmate...

post_info.post_title: Love is a double edged sword

Judeau
That's a cool little poem there. Is it orginial or one that you read and liked?
DrNo
I wrote this for a woman I love very much. Sometimes, it seems love isn't enough...
Jim Colyer
We have all been through this. Sometimes, you just have to pick up and go on.
Winston Smith

Amen to that. 
 
 Unrequited love seems to be as common as requited love
O'Grouchy

My favorite comment regarding love is short and sweet, well okay not so sweet.
 
 
 Love is a four letter word.
Winston Smith

love is a four letter word alright but so is hate.
 
 if most women weren't so sluttish .. love would last longer. emoticon_mad
Gunter

You simply have to take a close look at your potential partners. When you buy a car, you won't simply rush to the market and take the next one fancy looking either. 
 
 Ok we all tend to make this mistake out of our animal instincts, but before starting a partnership, you should take your time.
 
 It may be frustrating to find out how long you will have to look for the right one this way, but when you have found her, it is all the more rewarding :)
E Mutz

You simply have to take a close look at your potential partners. When you buy a car, you won't simply rush to the market and take the next one fancy looking either. 
 
 Ok we all tend to make this mistake out of our animal instincts, but before starting a partnership, you should take your time.
 
 It may be frustrating to find out how long you will have to look for the right one this way, but when you have found her, it is all the more rewarding
 
 
 Or you could end up with a model with high mileage, bad uphoulstery, and in need of a new rear end.
